biotools.summary: CLAIRE stands for Constrained Large Deformation Diffeomorphic Image Registration. It is a C/C++ software package for velocity-based diffeomorphic image registration in three dimensions.

bioschemas.name: CLAIRE
bioschemas.summary: CLAIRE stands for Constrained Large Deformation Diffeomorphic Image Registration. It is a C/C++ software package for velocity-based diffeomorphic image registration in three dimensions.
